dict.acceptation: 花费，支出；费用，经费；（尤指金钱的）支出额；（精力、时间、材料等的）耗费；

sent.orig: The final consumption expenditure is broken down into household consumption expenditure and government consumption expenditure.
sent.trans: 最终消费支出分为居民消费支出和政府消费支出。

sent.orig: Total Expenditure of Urban Households refers to all expenditure of households except expenditure on lending.
sent.trans: 城镇家庭总支出指除借贷支出以外的全部家庭支出。

sent.orig: It turns capital expenditure into operational expenditure, which makes things much easier and cheaper.
sent.trans: 它把资本支出转化为营运支出，这就更加便宜又便捷了。

sent.orig: The structure of fiscal expenditure is the inner proportion relation of fiscal expenditure.
sent.trans: 财政支出结构是财政支出的内部比例关系。

sent.orig: Capital expenditure can be financed by borrowing; operating expenditure should not.
sent.trans: 资本支出可以靠借款，而运营费用不行。
